question.text: After the next {Shots on target}, continue tracking that team. Answers must be 'Trigger: {Shots on target} by left/right' and 'Then: <Event> by left/right' for {Shots on target, Shots off target and Goal}.

answer.text: Trigger: Shots on target by left
Then: Shots on target by left
Then: Shots off target by left
Then: Shots on target by left
